replies.msg:
COME ON YOU SPURS




熱刺是一間座落英國倫敦北部托定咸區的職業足球會
從1882年成立至今已經擁有過百年歷史，現時競逐於英格蘭超級聯賽；
球會沒有主場，球會的拉丁文格言 ”Audere est Facere (To Dare Is To Do)” 則意謂「敢作敢為」


榮譽：

甲組聯賽 冠軍：1950/1951、1960/1961
足總盃 冠軍：1900/1901、1920/1921、1960/1961、1961/1962、1966/1967、1980/1981、1981/1982、1990/1991
聯賽盃 冠軍：1970/1971、1972/1973、1998/1999、2007/2008
歐洲盃賽冠軍盃 冠軍：1962/1963
歐洲足協杯 冠軍：1971/1972、1983/1984
賽馬會傑志中心挑戰盃 冠軍：2017/2018
國際冠軍盃 冠軍：2018/2019

https://www.tottenhamhotspur.com/news/2018/october/brazil-call-for-lucas/

09 October 2018|Tottenham Hotspur

Lucas Moura has been added to the Brazil squad for their matches against Saudi Arabia and Argentina over the next fortnight.

The 26-year-old last featured for his national side in June, 2016, but has earned a recall after an impressive start to the season with us, which has seen him score three goals in 11 games in all competitions, including a memorable brace away to Manchester United in August.

In fact, Lucas is the only player to have featured in all of our competitive matches so far this season.

With Brazil training at Hotspur Way this week, as they did before the World Cup in the summer, Lucas will initially find himself on ‘home’ turf before the squad jets off for their match against Saudi Arabia on Friday night.

They will remain in Saudi Arabia for their clash with rivals Argentina next Tuesday, a fixture that could see Lucas come up against Club team-mate Juan Foyth, who has been included in the Argentina squad for the first time.
